alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 7:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Thomas and Brooks Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 705 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Boston, or 7 miles east of Thomasville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quitman, Thomasville, Boston, Pavo, Coolidge, Morven, Barwick, Dixie, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Barney, Dillon, Enon, Patten, Eason, Oaklawn, Merrillville, Pidcock, Brooks Co A/p, Hollis and Newark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
